Character.Description: A striking, confident middle-aged woman with a cyberpunk edge; intelligent and unapologetically powerful.

Build.UpperBody: Broad shoulders, strong arms, pronounced curves
Build.LowerBody: Full hips and thighs, assertive stance

Face.Makeup: High-contrast makeup; sharp eyeliner, metallic accents, bold magenta or neon lips
Face.Complexion: Fair-light skin with cool highlights and cinematic contrast

Hair.Style: Loose waves or wind-swept, dramatic movement

Base.ColorPalette: Black, magenta, electric purple, cyan accents
Base.Material: Leather, synthetic tech fabrics, reflective elements

Situational.Accessories: LED accents, metallic jewelry, smart wearables

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, warm illustration quality

Lighting.Shadows: Soft, layered, creating depth without harshness

ColorPalette.Treatment: Warm and muted, natural tones with pops of warmth from lighting

Situation.Name: Portrait
Situation.Setting: Cozy corner coffee shop with exposed brick and wooden tables
Situation.Camera: Medium close-up, three-quarter view, shallow depth of field

CharacterPose.Gesture: Hands wrapped around a coffee mug

Environment.Name: Window light
Environment.Description: Soft daylight streaming through large window

Situation.LightingFocus: Soft natural window light with warm interior accents
